title: Support for PixArt models please🙏
body: He visto que ComfyUI ahora soporta de forma nativa estos modelos tanto Sigma como Alpha pero el modelo t5 que uso es un Q6 dada la poca capacidad de memoria que tengo, agradecería infinitamente que incluyeras la configuración para este CLIP por favor. Saludos desde la isla de Cuba amigo
author: Mike257art

comments.body: Sorry, forgot to add it after the PixArt PR got merged in comfy. Should be working now.
Gracias por tu rápida ayuda amigo un gran abrazo desde la isla de Cuba!!

satisfaction_conditions: Support for PixArt model variants compatible with low-memory environments
Inclusion of required CLIP configuration parameters
Native integration with ComfyUI's existing PixArt support

title: Error occurred when executing DualCLIPLoaderGGUF:
body:
I'm getting this errors message wen loading the dual clip Gguf loader, im using the t5-v1_1-xxl-encoder-Q5_K_M.gguf

Error occurred when executing DualCLIPLoaderGGUF:

module 'comfy.sd' has no attribute 'load_text_encoder_state_dicts'

File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 316, in execute
output_data, output_ui, has_subgraph = get_output_data(obj, input_data_all, execution_block_cb=execution_block_cb, pre_execute_cb=pre_execute_cb)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 191, in get_output_data
return_values = _map_node_over_list(obj, input_data_all, obj.FUNCTION, allow_interrupt=True, execution_block_cb=execution_block_cb, pre_execute_cb=pre_execute_cb)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 168, in _map_node_over_list
process_inputs(input_dict, i)
File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 157, in process_inputs
results.append(getattr(obj, func)(**inputs))
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-GGUF\nodes.py", line 224, in load_clip
return (self.load_patcher(clip_paths, clip_type, self.load_data(clip_paths)),)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
File "K:\ComfyUI\ComfyUI\custom_nodes\ComfyUI-GGUF\nodes.py", line 183, in load_patcher
clip = comfy.sd.load_text_encoder_state_dicts(
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
author: kakachiex2
satisfaction_conditions: Resolve missing method error in ComfyUI installation
Ensure compatibility between ComfyUI version and GGUF custom node requirements
